# mda_biber { #pybiber.BiberAnalyzer.mda_biber }

```python
BiberAnalyzer.mda_biber(threshold=0.35)
```

Project results onto Biber's dimensions.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name      | Type   | Description                                                                          | Default   |
|-----------|--------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| threshold | float  | The factor loading threshold (in absolute value) used to calculate dimension scores. | `0.35`    |
